name: VOL. 1 TORCH LIGHT / Ch.1 Moonlight Dream
description:
Is that me? Budi? What am i doing there? While carrying 2 long machetes like very sure of what he will face. That palace is very magnificent and beautiful, but the atmosphere around it is very gripping. What weird feeling is this Budi? i feel... as far as i know I’m not that strong to face Buta who looks as strong as gods. What’s happening here? Everything feels fake. Who is that big Buta? Even though  it’s not almighty. Is this real? I’m sure, clearly, this is not in Kertapura.




Premises : After jati mulya village where he live attacked by a group of bandits, a teenage student just found out that his entire life he has been trained by his uncle to protect his village from 7 concueror clans whose want to take over a powerfull energy source which hidden deep inside his village.


Guar is the first illustrated story series from Studio Tojat created by Barri Soema which will be presented in the form of NFT.
